Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 5 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Glaive, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 8 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Longbow, Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 150/600ft, Average Damage: 6 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Gnoll makes 2 attacks, either with its Glaive or its Longbow, and uses Incite Rampage if it can
Other Actions.Action 2: Incite Rampage, The Gnoll Pack Lord incites another Gnoll into using its Reaction to make a Melee attack against a nearby creature

Abilities.Ability 1: Rampage, When the Gnoll defeats a creature with a melee attack, it goes on a rampage, sprinting to another creature and biting it
